nodes.text: Naboo Coolers were beverages that could be found on the Outer Rim planet Actlyon. While in a cantina on Actlyon around 34 ABY, the smuggler Izal Garsea drank a Naboo Cooler, and then left her table to order more drinks for her colleagues in Ana Tolla's crew. She gathered beverages for the crew at the bar, including two Naboo Coolers that spilled as she carried them back. Her crew leader, Ana Tolla, was displeased, questioning whether she had drunk both on the way over.

Naboo Coolers that Garsea had spilled on herself left their scent on her black leather jacket, prompting her to look for another to wear after she had left the cantina. Naboo Coolers also shared their name with the Mid Rim planet Naboo.
Naboo Coolers appeared in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
